metadata.title: Product - Scalar
metadata.description: Discover Scalar's code-first approach to content management. Define models in code, sync to UI seamlessly.

hero.title: Code-first models
hero.description: Define models in code. Sync them seamlessly to Scalar's UI.

trackChanges.title: Track Changes
trackChanges.subDescription: Scalar's GitHub Sync lets you track model changes like any other code. Collaborate on schema changes just like features or fixes.

localDevelopment.title: Local Development
localDevelopment.subDescription: With npx scalar dev, your local environment becomes the control hub. Work offline, iterate rapidly, and push when you're ready.

modelDefinitions.title: Model Definitions
modelDefinitions.subDescription: Write once in code. Scalar reflects it in the admin panel immediately.

readyToScale.title: Ready to Scale
readyToScale.subDescription: Your teammates can still use the visual UI. Scalar lets devs code, and non-devs manage content with equal ease.
